description: The QRMX file is the main file type associated with Quick Risk Matrix, which is available for Windows and macOS in Standard and Premium editions. The file is created when you save your matrix design and can be exported to other formats, such as .PNG , .JPG , and .PDF .

Risk matrices are used in environments where risk assessment and management is important. Typically these environments are organizations that deal with a large amount of risk regarding finances, such as manufacturing companies, sports organizations, hospitals, aerospace companies, government departments, and energy companies.
